mapper.insert: insert into task(task_id, task_name, task_caption, create_date, task_status, recepient_id, recepient_name, tester_id, tester_name, archive, modify_date) values(#{taskId}, #{taskName}, #{taskCaption}, #{createDate}, #{taskStatus}, #{recepientId}, #{recepientName}, #{testerId}, #{testerName}, #{archive}, #{modifyDate});
mapper.update: update task set task_name=#{taskName}, task_caption=#{taskCaption}, create_date=#{createDate}, task_status=#{taskStatus}, recepient_id=#{recepientId}, recepient_name=#{recepientName}, tester_id=#{testerId}, tester_name=#{testerName}, archive=#{archive}, modify_date=#{modifyDate} where task_id=#{taskId}

update task set task_caption=#{taskCaption}, create_date=#{createDate}, task_status=#{taskStatus}, recepient_id=#{recepientId}, recepient_name=#{recepientName}, tester_id=#{testerId}, tester_name=#{testerName}, archive=#{archive}, modify_date=#{modifyDate} where task_name=#{taskName}
update task set task_status=#{taskStatus} where task_id=#{taskId}
